name: WebPixel Technologies
tagline: Web Design + Development, Mobile Apps, Branding
description:
We design and develop websites as well as mobile apps that deliver amazing UI experience and interaction on every device.
WebPixel Technologies provide comprehensive and integrated IT services that include Web design and development, Mobile application development,  Internet marketing services, Web maintenance and hosting. With the WebPixel values at the core of all, we do ensure quality delivered every time and on time!
